metadata.title: CVE-2016-2068 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The MSM QDSP6 audio driver (aka sound driver) for the Linux kernel 3.x, asused in Qualcomm Innovation Center (QuIC) Android contributions for MSMdevices and other products, allows attackers to gain privileges or cause adenial of service (integer overflow, and buffer overflow or bufferover-read) via a crafted application that performs a (1)AUDIO_EFFECTS_WRITE or (2) AUDIO_EFFECTS_READ operation, aka Qualcomminternal bug CR1006609.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-mako: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
